subject: Re: [junit] Running jUnit suites from maven
msgSnippet: I d suggest having a look at the Maven readme s as this is more related to them than to JUnit. But here s something from Maven that might be of use to you;
messageBody:
I'd suggest having a look at the Maven readme's as this is more
related to them than to JUnit. But here's something from Maven that
might be of use to you;
http://maven.apache.org/general.html#test-property-name

Nina

2008/11/21 Jeff <jjg@...>:
> I have made jUnit 4 test suites and run them with maven from the command
> line. Is there a readme on how to do this as part of the regular build?
> Why doesn't maven run test suites automatically?
>
> Jeff
>
>



--
I reject your reality and substitute my own.
